ygData.subject: Re: Taunting Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I did this last night and now my taunt skill is level 60...woohoo! Grod Level 11 Paladin Inoruuk Server ... From: Scott Addison [mailto:scaddison23@yahoo.com]
ygData.messageBody:
I did this last night and now my taunt skill is level 60...woohoo!

Grod
Level 11 Paladin
Inoruuk Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Addison [mailto:scaddison23@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:14 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Taunting Skill


From: Scott Addison <scaddison23@...>


I found that I had to put a point into taunt before it would go up. I
kept hitting it up to about lvl 6 to no avail. I decided to try
putting a point in it, and sure enough, my taunt started to raise very
quickly.

Katrina
10th order Human Paladin
Tarew Marr


--- Stuart Christian <stuartc@...> wrote:
> From: "Stuart Christian" <stuartc@...>
>
> At level 4 my taunting skill is around 15-20. You
> don't have to put any
> points into it since you start out with that skill.
> I just keep hitting it
> everytime I get into a fight and it seems to go up
> pretty quickly.
>
> -Kalamar(E'ci)
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Thang Tran <tdt7@...>
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 12:49 PM
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Taunting Skill
>
>
> >From: "Thang Tran" <tdt7@...>
> >
> >Hi
> >I was wondering when the taunting skill goes up
> because since I first
> >started, I taunted everytime I fought a creature.
> Now I'm on lvl 6
> >but the skill is still less than feeble. Do I have
> to put practice
> >points on it first or doesn't it raise until a
> certain lvl?
> >
> >Elthain of Felwithe
> >Paladin of Tunare
> >Mithaniel Marr server
